query:
UPDATE color_schemes SET 
  primaryColor = '#FFD700',
  secondaryColor = '#1a1a1a',
  accentColor = '#FFA500',
  accentDarkColor = '#000000',
  backgroundColor = '#1a1a1a',
  secondaryLightColor = '#2d2d2d',
  isDark = 1
WHERE slug = 'black-friday';
command:
